00117    // Return true if this is an Closed ensemble.
00118    inline bool SpeciesEnsemble::isClosed() const
00119    { return (type_ == CLOSED); }
00120  
00121    // Return true if this is an Grand Ensemble.
00122    inline bool SpeciesEnsemble::isGrand() const
00123    { return (type_ == GRAND); }
